column1: Image size (256, 128, 1) with weighting in T2 of the MRI, showing the head of a man of 37 years old of axial section. Slice n°185 is observed starting from the base of the skull. The following elements are present : the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 627.5391 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 2641.9922 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 696.0938 mm³ and the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 2598.4863 mm³.
